dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-10 TOMS Circumpolar One-Degree PAR Images
title: BOREAS RSS-10 TOMS Circumpolar One-Degree PAR Images
summary: The BOREAS RSS-10 team investigated the magnitude of daily, seasonal, and yearly variations of PAR from ground and satellite observations.  This data set contains satellite estimates of surface-incident photosynthetically active radiation (PAR, 400-700 nm, MJ m-2) at 1 degree spatial resolution. The spatial coverage is circumpolar from latitudes of 41 to 66 degrees N latitude.
